FuncDef: This command configures the credit control server to use. In case of RADIUS, the servers defined in the authentication policy are used. For Diameter, the peers defined in the specified Diameter policy are used.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies to use the RADIUS authentication servers defined in the RADIUS authentication policy in the group interface to report credit usage and obtain new credit.
Specifies to use the diameter peers specified in the diameter policy to report credit usage and obtain new credit.
